message: I'm offering you a great deal on this product for $10000. It's a fantastic opportunity to get a high-quality item at a fraction of its worth. I'm confident you'll be thrilled with your purchase.
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to wait and see the quality of the product before making a decision.

I completely understand your skepticism, Bob. Let me give you a bit more information. I've had this product inspected by a third-party expert, and they've confirmed that it's a genuine, brand-new item.
